00206 // inline methods

00208 inline bool CRange::IsValid() const
00209 {
00210        return (m_minValue <= m_maxValue);
00211 }
00212 
00213 
00214 inline bool CRange::IsEmpty() const
00215 {
00216        return (m_minValue == m_maxValue);
00217 }

00244 inline double CRange::GetLength() const
00245 {
00246        return IsValid()? m_maxValue - m_minValue: 0;

00250 inline bool CRange::Contains(double value) const
00251 {
00252        I_ASSERT(IsValid());
00253 
00254        return (m_minValue <= value) && (m_maxValue >= value);
00255 }
00256 
00257 
00258 inline bool CRange::Contains(const CRange& range) const
00259 {
00260        I_ASSERT(IsValid());
00261        I_ASSERT(range.IsValid());
00262 
00263        return (m_minValue <= range.m_minValue) && (m_maxValue >= range.m_maxValue);
00264 }
00265 
00266 
00267 inline double CRange::GetValueFromAlpha(double alpha) const
00268 {
00269        return GetMinValue() + alpha * GetLength();
00270 }
00271 
00272 
00273 inline double CRange::GetAlphaFromValue(double value) const
00274 {
00275        return (value - GetMinValue()) / GetLength();
00276 }
00277 
00278 
00279 inline bool CRange::operator==(const CRange& range) const
00280 {
00281        return (m_maxValue == range.m_maxValue) && (m_minValue == range.m_minValue);
00282 }
00283 
00284 
00285 inline bool CRange::operator!=(const CRange& range) const
00286 {
00287        return (m_maxValue != range.m_maxValue) || (m_minValue != range.m_minValue);
00288 }
